compiler.title: Compiler of a subset of C
compiler.description: A compiler for a subset of the C programming language.
compiler.explanation: This was a project developed for the course of Compilers of the UPV (Universitat Politècnica de València). It was made using YACC, FLEX and BISON. All parts of the compilation process were covered. Lexic, syntactic and semantic analysis, code optimization and intermediate code generation. The output was interpreted by a VM that could execute the instructions of the intermediate code.

scraper.title: Wikipedia Web Scraper
scraper.description:
Scrape a web page and display its content. Search throughout the stored indexes and find specific sentences. This served as a small proof of how important is the content of a page in terms of SEO and page ranking.

Web crawlers and search engines use this kind of techniques to index and rank websites. The content of a page should be relevant to the user in order to be well ranked in search engines.
